name: DeFi Shoe
description:
Inspired by Alexander McQueen's high pumps, the DeFi Shoe tells a story of our journey through decentralised finance. The dominant vamp and toe box structure representing just how loud of an impact this new age of finance had- it was strong and robust, scalable for a future of big innovation. 

Look closely on the heel to see Uniswap rising to the top, Yearn Finance at a prominent centre, AAVE, Compound and Maker working together in unison and Nexus Mutual directly below to save their fall.
